General_review: Lofat is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Healthy, Sandwiches, Breakfast that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Halifa, Adailiya and Airport.

Their best selling dishes are Chicken Biryani, Baked Fries, Grilled Chicken Lettuce Wrap and Grilled Chicken Pasta, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Sandwiches, Breakfast.
They have been reviewed 13284 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

Teasers.description: Our crispy skin on fries topped with our house made truffle cream sauce, garnished with parmesan cheese, and chopped parsley.

Teasers.name: Golden Wedges
Teasers.description: Your ultimate craving! fried potato wedges served with our signatures spizy sauce.

Teasers.name: Chicken Breaded
Teasers.description: Enjoy a flavor odyssey with 4 pieces of chicken fillet strips breaded with crumbs. Served with honey mustard dip.

Teasers.name: Halloumi Sticks
Teasers.description: Embark on an adventure with taste. 4 pieces of halloumi cheese sticks breaded with crumbs served with thousand island dip.

Teasers.name: Fries
Teasers.description: Treat your taste buds to a basket of french fries.

Teasers.name: Fries & Cheese
Teasers.description: Set out on a sensantional saga of fries topped with melted cheese. Served with sour cream.

Teasers.name: Baked Potato And Cheese
Teasers.description: Baked potato slices topped with melted cheese, pine seeds & a pinch of rosemary. Served with sour cream.

Teasers.name: Cheese Sambousek
Teasers.description: The famous fried cheese wraps ( 6 pcs ).

Teasers.name: Hummus & Crackers
Teasers.description: Our version of a national emblem. Mashed chickpeas blended with tahini sauce. Served with grilled vegetables & toasted Multicereal crackers.

Salads.name: Seasoned chicken salad
Salads.description: A bed of fresh lettuce & rocket leaves with oven roasted carrots & beetroot, cherry tomatoes, fresh green & red bell pepper topped with our signature grilled chicken. Served with our special honey garlic mustard dressing

Salads.name: Rocca and cheese salad
Salads.description: Rocket leaves, fresh mushroom & Mshallaleh cheese garnished with Parmesan cheese & roasted almonds. Served with Pomegranate dressing

Salads.name: Quinoa Halloumi Salad
Salads.description: Quinoa , grilled vegetables, black beans, peas, slices of cherry tomatoes, topped with grilled halloumi cubes, chia seeds & pumpkin seeds. Served with quinoa sauce.

Salads.name: Chicken Kale Salad
Salads.description: Kale, flax seeds, dried apricots, green thyme, purslane & grilled chicken. Served with balsamic dressing.

Salads.name: Mixed Greens
Salads.description: A mix of fresh green vegetables with vinegar oil dressing.

Salads.name: Simply Caesar
Salads.description: Crunchy romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese and oven baked croutons.

Salads.name: Z Fattoush
Salads.description: A fresh pick of tomatoes, cucumbers, mint, parsley, green onions, green pepper, purslane, lettuce, cheese and oven baked bread squares. Best enjoyed with our special vinaigrette dressing.

Salads.name: Caesar Deluxe
Salads.description: Simply caesar with grilled chicken on top.

Salads.name: Chicken Salad
Salads.description: A delicious blend of green mix, rocca, pineseeds, sun-dried tomato and purslane, topped with roasted chicken. Best enjoyed with balsamic dressing.

Salads.name: Zooza Salad
Salads.description: A bright mix of black beans, boiled egg, tomatoes, corn,black olives, tuna and lettuce. Best enjoyed with mustard vinegar dressing.

Salads.name: Quinoa Tabbouleh
Salads.description: Light & fresh, enjoy a mix of quinoa, chopped tomatoes, green onions, parsley and mint.

Special wraps.name: Chicken Shawarma
Special wraps.description: Our signature seasoned shawarma chicken with lettuce, pickles, homegrown fries & garlic mayo sauce

Special wraps.name: Home style veggie sandwich
Special wraps.description: Roasted eggplant paired with baked cauliflower & topped with homegrown fries, tomato & tahini sauce. Wrapped in our freshly baked oat flatbread

Special wraps.name: Hummus wrap
Special wraps.description: Our signature hummus on oat flatbread with chili spread & topped with avocado, tomato, olive oil, basil & a mix of grilled eggplant, bell pepper & sesame seeds

Special wraps.name: Classic batata wrap
Special wraps.description: Crispy cut fries wrapped with coleslaw, pickles, ketchup & garlic mayo sauce

Special wraps.name: Shawarma
Special wraps.description: The taste of tradition with a twist: white flat bread, beef shawarma, tomato, parsley, with a delicious tahini sauce.

Special wraps.name: NEW Amazing Tuna
Special wraps.description: Our special tuna mixed with mayo sauce, with tapenade, and shredded lettuce. Wrapped in our freshly baked multigrain flatbread. (New Recipe)

Special wraps.name: Mighty Kafta
Special wraps.description: A delicious kebab mix with cheese , tomatoes and mayo on top. Served as flatbread or wrapped.

Special wraps.name: Famous Chicken
Special wraps.description: Irresistible roasted chicken with melted cheese with lettuce , tomatoes, pickles and aioli sauce on top.

Special wraps.name: Halloumi & Beef Bacon
Special wraps.description: Mouth-watering halloumi cheese and bacon topped with tomatoes and mayo served on oat dough.

Special wraps.name: Frankfurter
Special wraps.description: Slices of beef hotdog with melted cheese, mayo and ketchup.

Special wraps.name: BBQ Steak
Special wraps.description: Juicy marinated prime beef with bell pepper,rocca, onions, melted cheese and bbq mayo sauce on top.

Special wraps.name: Tawook
Special wraps.description: Were changing the way your preceive taouk. Our own recipe of perfectly marinated chicken, fries pickles & garlic mayo sauce.

Special wraps.name: Chicken Escalope
Special wraps.description: Fried chicken escalope with lettuce, tomatoes, pickles and garlic mayo.

Special wraps.name: Spizy Chicken
Special wraps.description: Succulent marinated chicken with bell pepper, rocca, onions, melted cheese and our mild spicy sauce on top.

Special wraps.name: Turkey & Cheese
Special wraps.description: A classic combination of melted cheese topped with slices of smoked turkey, pickles, lettuce and tomatoes seasoned with mustard mayo.

Special wraps.name: Baked Falafel
Special wraps.description: A spiced falafel mixes seasoned with sesame syrup and topped with parsley, tomatoes, turnip and radish.

Platters.name: Kozy Kafta
Platters.description: Deliciously baked Kafta with potato slices, fresh tomato & marinara sauce. Garnished with freshly chopped parsley. Served with freshly baked bread & tahini dipping sauce on the side.

Platters.name: Potato Chicken
Platters.description: Roasted chicken with grilled potatoes & tomatoes marinated in a garlic lemon and coriander sauce. Served with freshly baked bread.

Homemade.name: Shakshuka
Homemade.description: A sizzling combination of eggs, onion, bell pepper, zucchini, eggplant & tomato freshly baked all together & garnished with freshly chopped parsley mix. Served with baked bread on the side

Pizzas.name: BBQ Chicken
Pizzas.description: Barbecue sauce, chicken, fresh mushroom, green pepper, cheddar & mozzarella cheese, coriander & olives.

Pizzas.name: Pepperoni
Pizzas.description: Tomato sauce with mozzarella cheese, oregano, fresh mushroom and beef pepperoni.

Pizzas.name: Ultimate Cheese
Pizzas.description: For the cheese lovers, tomato sauce on dough, smothered in 4 cheese and oregano.

Pizzas.name: Traditional
Pizzas.description: Tomato sauce with mozzarella cheese, smoked beef, oregano and fresh mushroom.

Pizzas.name: Veggie
Pizzas.description: Pesto sauce, zucchini, mozzarella & fetta cheese, olives, hot green pepper, cherry tomatoes, rocket leaves & fresh onions.

Breakfast.name: Eggs Your Way
Breakfast.description: Sunny side up or scrambled (with fresh creme)? 3 eggs baked your way.

Breakfast.name: Labneh
Breakfast.description: Traditional Lebanese creamy yogurt drizzled with olive oil. Served with freshly baked bread, mint leaves,tomatoes, cucumbers and olives.

Breakfast.name: Halloumi Pan
Breakfast.description: Youll never resist our slices of baked halloumi cheese.

Breakfast.name: Light Halloumi Pan
Breakfast.description: Slices of baked light halloumi cheese. Served with mint leaves, tomatoes and cucumbers.

Manakeesh.name: Egg and cheese
Manakeesh.description: Scrambled eggs with melted cheese topped with mayo & wrapped in fresh white bread.

Manakeesh.name: Wild Zaatar
Manakeesh.description: Zwz version of wild thyme and our special onion and tomato sauce on multi cereal dough.

Manakeesh.name: Zaatar
Manakeesh.description: Delicious dried thyme mixed with sesame, sumac, oil and organic loomi a healthier and tastier mix.

Manakeesh.name: Zaatar & Cheese
Manakeesh.description: The best of both worlds: zaatar on one half and cheese on the other.

Manakeesh.name: Zaatar & Labneh
Manakeesh.description: A great mix of great taste,the traditional thyme mix with creamy yogurt spread.

Manakeesh.name: Smoked Beef & Cheese
Manakeesh.description: A classic combination of melted cheese with slices of smoked beef.

Manakeesh.name: Jebneh
Manakeesh.description: Simple soul food, the traditional melted cheese wrap.

Manakeesh.name: Halloumi
Manakeesh.description: You cant go wrong with the famous halloumi cheese.

Manakeesh.name: Kashkawan
Manakeesh.description: Experience the heavenly taste of melted kashkawan cheese.

Manakeesh.name: Labneh Arous
Manakeesh.description: Traditional cream yogurt mixed with tapenade. Served with olives, tomatoes, cucumbers and fresh mint leaves. Wrapped in oat dough.

Manakeesh.name: Laham Bi Ajine
Manakeesh.description: A classic: minced meat cooked with spices, onions and tomatoes, the traditional lebanese way.

Manakeesh.name: Egg Wrap
Manakeesh.description: Enjoy a tasty scrambled egg wrap.

Desserts.name: Carrot Cake
Desserts.description: Moist cinnamon flavoured carrot cake covered with soft cream cheese frosting

Desserts.name: Chocolate Mousse Cake
Desserts.description: Chocolate cake and chocolate mousse.

Desserts.name: Ktiramisu
Desserts.description: Our heavenly version of the famous tiramisu dessert.

Desserts.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
Desserts.description: The famous cheesecake with a strawberry twist.

Desserts.name: Blueberry Cheesecake
Desserts.description: The famous cheesecake with a blueberry twist.

Desserts.name: Red velvet cake
Desserts.description: Luscious red velvet cake with creamy frosting

Dessert Wraps.name: Chocolate & Banana
Dessert Wraps.description: Mmm. Melted hazelnut milk chocolate spread, topped with slices of banana.

Kids Meal.name: Kids Meal
Kids Meal.description: Your choice of mini chicken wrap, mini chicken tenders, mini frankfurter or mini pizza. All items come with add-on fries, soft drink, juice or water.

Extras.name: Vegetables Plate
Extras.description: Platter with an assortment of vegetables.

General_review: Zaatar W Zeit is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Wraps, Manaqeesh that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Cheese Sambousek, Turkey & Cheese, Famous Chicken and Halloumi, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Wraps, Manaqeesh.
They have been reviewed 92817 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Steak Master Restaurant is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Chinese, Seafood, Japanese that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Chicken Dumpling, Salmon Teppanyaki, Spicy Chicken Miso Ramen and korean potato, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Chinese, Seafood, Japanese.
They have been reviewed 17538 times by talabat users, with a rating of 5.
Wendy's is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of American, Fast Food, Burgers that delivers across Abu Halifa, Al-Ahmadi, Ardhiya, Fahad Al Ahmed and Fahaheel.
Their best selling dishes are Chicken Nuggets, Fries, Wendy's Single Sandwich and Beef Chili, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like American, Fast Food, Burgers.
They have been reviewed 47626 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Their best selling dishes are Ward, Jawzeya Box, Classic Istanbuliyah and Mix Istanbuliyah, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Ice cream, Arabic sweets.
They have been reviewed 4193 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Health Stop is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Healthy, Burgers, Breakfast that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Healthy Fries and Egg Mortadella Wrap, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Burgers, Breakfast.
They have been reviewed 66044 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

They have been reviewed 16489 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Karak Station is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Coffee, Tea that delivers across Abu Halifa, Adailiya, Al-Bedae, Andalous and Ardhiya.
Their best selling dishes are Karak Tea, Halloumi Chapati, Karak Station and Egg Cheese Chapati, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Coffee, Tea.
They have been reviewed 73766 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Mishmash is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Grills, Shawarma, Sandwiches that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Original Fries, Classic Chicken Fillet, Mix Grills and Chicken Shawarma, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Grills, Shawarma, Sandwiches.
They have been reviewed 147540 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Arzaag is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Kuwaiti, Seafood, Grills that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Chicken Machboos, Grape Leaves, Lamb Machboos and Greesh, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Kuwaiti, Seafood, Grills.
They have been reviewed 4894 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

Their best selling dishes are Qatayef, Khechneh Cheese, Mabrouma and Umm ALI, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Arabic, Arabic sweets.
They have been reviewed 64326 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Teddy Bakery is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Cakes, Desserts that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Birthday Box 30, Birthday Box 28, Birthday Box 25 and Birthday Box 26, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Cakes, Desserts.
They have been reviewed 410 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Leila Min Lebnan is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Lebanese, Grills, Mezze that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Tabbouleh Salad, Hummus, Chicken Liver and Warak Enab, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Lebanese, Grills, Mezze.
They have been reviewed 17368 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Burger Inn is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Burgers, Beverages, Fast Food that delivers across Al-Qusour, Ardhiya, Bayan, Jahra - Jahra Area and Maidan Hawally.

Their best selling dishes are Burger Inn Chicken Fillet, Messy Fries, Original Fries and Burgerinn Dbl Cheeseburger, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Burgers, Beverages, Fast Food.
They have been reviewed 24338 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Bm Sweet is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Pastries, Cakes that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Sweet and Salty Medium, Nutella Cake small, Happiness Cake + Nutella Cake and Happiness Cake Medium, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Pastries, Cakes.
They have been reviewed 1087 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Blue Egg is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Beverages, Cafe that delivers across Ardhiya and Sabah Al-Salem.
Their best selling dishes are HASH BROWN, Signature, HALLOUMI and TURKEY, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Beverages, Cafe.
They have been reviewed 4668 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Idrubha Belkhams is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Arabic, Kuwaiti, Seafood that delivers across Abu Halifa, Adan, Al Masayel, Al-Ahmadi and Ali Sabah Al-Salem - Umm Al Hayman.

Their best selling dishes are Milk With Lemon And Mint, Bukhari Rice With Grilled Chicken, Milk 1 Liter With Lemon And Mint and Corn Chicken Soup, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Arabic, Kuwaiti, Seafood.
They have been reviewed 4597 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Golden Wok Chinese is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Chinese, Indian, Seafood that delivers across Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya, Adan and Al Masayel.

Their best selling dishes are Shrimp Fried Rice, Sweet & Sour Chicken, Chicken Fried Rice and Kindo Chicken, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Chinese, Indian, Seafood.
They have been reviewed 4144 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Live Life is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Coffee, Sandwiches that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Live Life Halloumi, Falafel, Fresh Orange Juice and Spanish Omelette Sandwich, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Coffee, Sandwiches.
They have been reviewed 38800 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Nahma Restaurant is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Kuwaiti, Seafood, Arabic that delivers across Abu Ftaira, Abu Hasaniya, Adan, Al Masayel and Al-Qurain.

Their best selling dishes are Sea Bass 400 Gm, Machboos Meat Australian, Machboos Chicken and Sea Bass 600 Gm, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Kuwaiti, Seafood, Arabic.
They have been reviewed 1697 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Lean is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Healthy, Breakfast, Ice Cream that delivers across Al-Qurain, Ardhiya, Jabriya, Kuwait City and Sabah Al-Salem.
Their best selling dishes are Halloumi Wrap, Air Baked Chicken Fillet, Veggie Chips and Egg Bun, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Breakfast, Ice Cream.
They have been reviewed 7977 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Their best selling dishes are Grilled Neck, Maoun Tikka , Hummus and Arayes Meat, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Grills, Kuwaiti, Arabic.

General_review: Joy Cafe is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Sandwiches, Cafe, Desserts that delivers across Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya, Adan and Al Masayel.

Their best selling dishes are Fettuccine Mushroom, Strawberry Cheese Cake, Kinder Crepe and Pink Creamy Pasta, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Sandwiches, Cafe, Desserts.
They have been reviewed 4251 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Shrimp House is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Seafood, Sandwiches, Asian that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Shrimps, Build Your Bag 500gm, Build Your Bag 1 KG and Crab, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Seafood, Sandwiches, Asian.
They have been reviewed 10699 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: KAI Asian Diner is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Chinese, Thai, Asian that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Crunchy Korean Kickers Bowl, Chicken Katsu, Sushi Super Combo and Mongolian Beef, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Chinese, Thai, Asian.
They have been reviewed 21037 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: One of the Best Restaurant in Kuwait

General_review: Kanemochi is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Ice Cream, Coffee, Japanese that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are 6 Mochis, 12 Mix Mochis, Kane boba ice milky tea and Taro boba, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Ice Cream, Coffee, Japanese.
They have been reviewed 1436 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: It came fresh and cold and nicely packaged It came at a good time and none of the mochis were damaged
